newsitem.title: USA: CSCE to lower straddle margins on sugar #11.
newsitem.headline: CSCE to lower straddle margins on sugar #11.

text.p: Coffee, Sugar and Cocoa Exchange said Monday it will decrease Sugar #11 straddle margin rates, effective June 24.
Straddle or arbitrage transactions for customers who are CSCE members or members of the trade will require a minimum of $100, down from $150, the exchange said in a statement.
For customers who are not exchange members or a member of the trade, margins will be 140 percent above trade rates, CSCE said. ((-- New York Commodities Desk, 212 859 1640))
